subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in web-app (us-west-2)

messages.content:
Subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in web-app (us-west-2)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

A critical issue has been detected in the web-app's frontend in the us-west-2 region. Users are experiencing significant delays or failures in loading the application, likely due to a security policy that blocks cross-origin frames. This issue may stem from recent changes to the content security policy or third-party integrations. The load time has been recorded at 5503.24 ms with a bundle size of 520.22 kb and 14 resources loaded, indicating a severe impact on user experience.

Service: web-app
Region: us-west-2
Severity: critical
Event Type: frontend

Metrics:
{
  "load_time_ms": 5503.24,
  "bundle_size_kb": 520.22,
  "resources_loaded": 14
}

Workaround: Investigate the content security policy settings and review any recent changes to third-party integrations that may affect frame loading. Consider temporarily disabling the policy to confirm if it resolves the issue.

This ticket was auto-generated by the AI monitoring system.

current_triage.rationale: The ticket describes a critical frontend issue in the web-app causing significant delays or failures, indicating a severe impact on user experience.

current_routing.reasoning: Routed to engineering due to bug classification. SLA set based on enterprise tier and P0 priority. Escalated due to P0 critical priority.
